name: Phucker in the Ashes (itch)
description:
It's a brisk day in the Green Zone and Ryukaze and his cast of pals reflect upon their misadventures of recent memory. Discover the origins of Ryukaze, get lost in the infinite back alleys, and relive classic moments in HD graphics. Can you handle all the plot twists and gamer feels? Or will you collapse in a heap and cry for no reason at all?

Phucker in the Ashes is the Alpha and the Omega, the First and the Last, the Beginning and the End.

GENRE
Avant Garde Psycho-Political Visual Novel Extraordinaire

GAME INFO
Use the mouse to navigate, make important choices and self-investigate. Experience several hours of gut wrenching content that will leave you breathless.

PROS
  Contains Woods, Gulag, Rome, and the all new Novel.
  Extras such as Concept Art (very arousing) and Bloopers (kneeslappers).
  Explore endless alleys in Back Alleys mode.
  All graphics have been raised to HD standard (Gulag mostly).
  Features new characters Jack Banger, Prometheus the Werehog, and Striker.
  More "gamer feel" moments than you can shake a stick at.

CONS
  Is a pristine creation.

For Phuckerthusiasts Eyes Only
If you've played previous Phucker games, here is a breakdown of the additions made to the original games:

WOODS ADDITIONS
- Added self-investigate mode
- Extra scene (Ryukaze's dream)
- Piss filter and Christian Gamer mode options
- Secret item
- Sound quotes in profile
- Jack Banger as character

GULAG ADDITIONS
- Added self-investigate mode
- All BG's updated to HD
- Extra scene (Save Piotr)
- Big Head mode
- Secret item
- Sound quotes in profiles
- Prometheus the Werehog as character

ROME ADDITIONS
- Striker as character
